name: Circle Software Corporation
description: Developer of a property management software designed for real estate managers to save time. The company's software offers control over tenants' requests and enhances their living experience, lead a team with a productive flow, better manage the resources and cut the operational cost, manage all salesforce appointments with flexible calendar displays and layouts, enabling property managers to engage with their clients in an efficient manner, handle their requests effectively and reduce the overall operational costs.
one_liner: Developer of a property management software designed for real estate managers to save time. The company's software offers control over tenants' requests and enhances their living experience, lead a team with a productive flow, better manage the resources and cut the operational cost, manage all salesforce appointments with flexible calendar displays and layouts, enabling property managers to engage with their clients in an efficient manner, handle their requests effectively and reduce the overall operational costs.
